Package org.neo4j.kernel.impl.index.schema.config

Class SpaceFillingCurveSettingsFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.kernel.impl.index.schema.config.SpaceFillingCurveSettingsFactory
  • public final class SpaceFillingCurveSettingsFactory
extends Object

    This factory can be used to create new space filling curve settings for use in configuring the curves. These settings can be created either by defaults from the neo4j.conf file (see ConfiguredSpaceFullCurveSettingsCache) or from reading the header of an existing GBPTree based index.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor Description
      private SpaceFillingCurveSettingsFactory()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      (package private) static SpaceFillingCurveSettings fromConfig​(EnvelopeSettings envelopeSettings)
      This method builds the default index configuration object for the specified CRS and other config options.
      static SpaceFillingCurveConfiguration getConfiguredSpaceFillingCurveConfiguration​(Config config)
      Extracts settings from Config about how to optimize the 2D (or 3D) to 1D mapping of the space filling curve which will be used when querying geometry ranges.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpaceFillingCurveSettingsFactory

        private SpaceFillingCurveSettingsFactory()

    • Method Detail

      • fromConfig

        static SpaceFillingCurveSettings fromConfig​(EnvelopeSettings envelopeSettings)
        This method builds the default index configuration object for the specified CRS and other config options. Currently we only support a SingleSpaceFillingCurveSettings which is the best option for cartesian, but not necessarily the best for geographic coordinate systems.

      • getConfiguredSpaceFillingCurveConfiguration

        public static SpaceFillingCurveConfiguration getConfiguredSpaceFillingCurveConfiguration​(Config config)
        Extracts settings from Config about how to optimize the 2D (or 3D) to 1D mapping of the space filling curve which will be used when querying geometry ranges.
        Parameters:
        config - Config containing space filling curve settings.
        Returns:
        SpaceFillingCurveConfiguration from the settings found in Config.
